Yggdrasil: Better I tag along, I figure. Maybe Devilcat has decided 
something concerning me.

He wasn't very hot at the idea, since he did feel as some sort of 
prisoner. Hell, it was his fault right from the start. One thing he 
had not inherited from Prime was a certain sense of diplomacy. His 
machine guns talked louder anyways.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Gatara thinks for a minute.  "Well, I didn't see anyone like that at 
> the last major battle, but that could be for any number of reasons."
> 
> She is interrupted by Devilcat's signal.  "Oh shoot, we're going to 
> have to cut this conversation short."  She rises to her feet, but 
> appears reluctant to go.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil: Yeah, but the fact is I don'y even know where Talos is, 
> or 
> > even if he's alive right now. Got any clue?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "I see," Gatara muses.  "We're in much the same boat - until we 
> get 
> > > our engines repaired, this is just a fancy apartment complex."
> > >
